about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: After several years in the field of communication, I decided to retrain as a full-stack developer, specializing in frontend.
about.paragraph2: In parallel, I am also a musician, composer, and producer with an as-yet-unannounced project in preparation, scheduled for 2025.

web_development.name: Web Development
web_development.desc: During my current training at Ada Tech School...
web_development.full: During my current training at Ada Tech School, I have had the chance to quickly improve my skills in numerous programming languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, C#..) and to apply all of this throughout the months of training on various collective and personal projects.

web_design.name: Web Design
web_design.desc: Thanks to my current training and previous experiences...
web_design.full: Thanks to my current training and previous experiences, particularly in communication and web journalism, I have had the opportunity to perform a lot of web design work, whether for websites or services, aimed at effective public use while complying with current GDPR regulations and striving to improve accessibility.

wordpress.name: WordPress
wordpress.desc: With 7+ years of experience, I have had the chance to...
wordpress.full: With over 7 years of experience with WordPress, I have developed a true expertise in using what is still the most widely used CMS in the world today.

seo.name: SEO
seo.desc: With extensive experience as a web journalist, I have had the chance...
seo.full: With extensive experience as a web journalist, I have had the chance to train in SEO over time and to offer genuine expertise in terms of advice and practice regarding natural referencing.

photography.name: Photography
photography.desc: With my participation as a journalist at numerous events...
photography.full: With my participation as a journalist at numerous large-scale events, I have had the chance to photograph great artists from the music world (Roy Hargrove, Porcupine Tree...) and to provide a true framework design.

communication.name: Communication
communication.desc: Holder of a master's degree in communication, with over 4 years...
communication.full: Holding a master's degree in communication and with over 4 years of experience in the field of communication, I have enjoyed working on various projects in many areas, whether in music, the world of craft beer, or professional training.

web_writing.name: Web Writing
web_writing.desc: With 7+ years of experience as a web journalist...
web_writing.full: With over 7 years of experience as a web journalist for media such as ActuGaming or DangerZone, I have had the opportunity to improve my skills and expertise in this field, both in pure writing and in professional relationship work.

portfolio.title: My portfolio
portfolio.projectsIntro: Here are some of my projects:

contact.title: Let's Connect!
contact.description: If you'd like to discuss together, talk about collaboration, or even about your favorite music album, don't hesitate!
